title: 94/769/EC: Commission Decision of 25 November 1994 on the list of programmes for the eradication and monitoring of animal diseases qualifying for a financial contribution from the Community in 1995
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 25 November 1994 on the list of programmes for the eradication and monitoring of animal diseases qualifying for a financial contribution from the Community in 1995 (94/769/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN  COMMUNITIES
main_body:
1. The programmes listed in the Annex hereto shall qualify for a financial contribution from the Community in 1995.
2. For each programme as referred to in paragraph 1, the proposed rate and amount of the Community financial contribution shall be as set out in the Annex.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 25 November 1994.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 224, 18. 8. 1990, p. 19.
(2) OJ No L 168, 2. 7. 1994, p. 31.
ANNEX
